wikipedia_page.main: Craig Ross Wighton (born 27 July 1997) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a forward for Scottish Championship club Arbroath, on loan from Dunfermline Athletic. He has previously played for Dundee, Brechin City, Raith Rovers, Arbroath and Heart of Midlothian.

response: * Youngest Goalscorer: Craig Wighton, 16 years 105 days against Raith Rovers 9 November 2013
